title: TDC2 2008 | Type Director's Club Type Design Competition
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080214092753/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 13.Dec.2007 5.51pm 

It’s that time of year, and this year it’s easier than ever to send  
 an entry to the Type Directors Club Type Design Competition (TDC2).

Along with having a stellar jury — Lance Hidy, Larry Oppenberg,  
 Sara Soskolne, Gerard Unger, with Matthew Carter as Chair, this year  
 TDC has inaugurated a system of PDF uploads for type design samples.

Designers or submitters may either send printed samples by mail or  
 send 11x17 US Tabloid formatted PDFs via secure server uploads. PDF  
 entries will be printed out by the TDC prior to the judging.  
 The server can be also used to register entries and print labels for  
 mailed or shipped entries.

Full Call guidelines and procedures for the TDC2 2008 Type Design  
 Competition are at:  
 [http://www.tdc.org/calls/tdc22008/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080214092753/http:/www.tdc.org/calls/tdc22008/index.html "http://www.tdc.org/calls/tdc22008/index.html")

As well, the online registration facility is available to entrants to  
TDC54 Typography, the TDC’s annual competition for excellence in  
typography, though the upload function is not available. The TDC54  
Call guidelines and procedures are at:  
 [http://www.tdc.org/calls/tdc542008/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080214092753/http:/www.tdc.org/calls/tdc542008/index.html "http://www.tdc.org/calls/tdc542008/index.html")

Winning works in TDC2 2008 Type Design and in TDC54 Typography will  
 be exhibited in six traveling shows and published in Typography 29,  
 The Annual of The Type Directors Club, a hardbound, all-color  
 competition annual designed by Philippe Apeloig.

Deadlines for the competitions are  
 TDC2 2008 :: Friday 14 December 2007  
 TDC54 :: Friday 4 January 2008
author: Miss Tiffany
